DevTool

Streamline your development workflow with powerful automation tools. Build, test, and deploy faster than ever before.

Get Started View Documentation

Built for developers, by developers

Everything you need to build, deploy, and scale APIs with confidence.

Instant Deployment

Go from code to production in seconds with zero configuration. CI/CD pipeline included.

Managed Database

Built-in database with automatic scaling, backups, and data validation.

Built-in Auth

Secure APIs with zero config auth. JWT, OAuth, and API keys supported out of the box.

Auto-Scaling

Handles traffic spikes automatically. Scale to zero when idle to optimize costs.

Real-time Monitoring

Live metrics, logs, and traces with built-in alerting. Debug with confidence.

Fair Pricing

Free tier for hobbyists and startups. Pay only for what you use with no surprises.

Simple, powerful API development

From simple REST endpoints to complete GraphQL services, built-in with DevTool.

import { createAPI } from '@devtool/core'

// Create a new API
const api = createAPI()

// Define your routes
api.get('/users/:id', async (req) => {
  const { id } = req.params
  return await db.users.findOne(id)
})

// Add middleware
api.use(async (req, res, next) => {
  console.log(`${req.method} ${req.path}`)
  await next()
})

// Create routes in database
await api.db.createTable('users', {
  columns: {
    id: 'uuid',
    name: 'string',
    email: 'string',
    created_at: 'timestamp'
  },
  indexes: ['email']
})

// Or use raw SQL for fine control
const users = await api.db.sql`
  SELECT * FROM users
  WHERE created_at > ${date}
  ORDER BY created_at DESC
`

// Start the server
api.listen(3000)
